faq.question: What is Physics Wallah?
faq.answer: Physics Wallah is India's most affordable and trusted platform for JEE and NEET preparation. We provide comprehensive courses with live classes, recorded lectures, doubt solving, and test series at just ₹4,999 per year - a fraction of traditional coaching costs.

faq.question: Is there a free tier?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer completely free NCERT and foundation classes on our YouTube channel. You can start learning without spending a rupee. Our paid courses are also extremely affordable at ₹3,999 to ₹4,999 per year.

faq.question: Who is Physics Wallah for?
faq.answer: Physics Wallah is for all JEE and NEET aspirants from Class 11, Class 12, and droppers. Whether you're a beginner or preparing seriously for top ranks, our courses cater to all levels. We've helped thousands of students get into IITs, NITs, and AIIMS.

faq.question: How is PW so affordable?
faq.answer: We believe quality education should be accessible to everyone. By operating digitally and keeping operations lean, we offer courses at ₹4,999 per year compared to ₹1.5-2 lakh for traditional coaching. Our mission is Padhega India Tab Badhega India.

faq.question: What's included in the course?
faq.answer: Each course includes live classes by expert teachers, recorded lectures for revision, DPP - Daily Practice Problems, comprehensive test series, doubt clearing sessions, study material PDFs, and unlimited access to the PW app. Everything you need for JEE or NEET.

faq.question: What is the Lakshya program?
faq.answer: Lakshya is our 2-year program for Class 11 students. It covers the complete JEE or NEET syllabus from basics to advanced level with live classes, practice problems, and regular tests. Price is just ₹4,999 per year.

faq.question: What is the Arjuna program?
faq.answer: Arjuna is our 1-year intensive program for Class 12 students and droppers. It focuses on rapid revision, advanced problem-solving, and test-taking strategy for those with one year left before the exam. Price is ₹3,999 per year.

faq.question: Do you have offline centers?
faq.answer: Yes, we have Vidyapeeth offline centers in major cities across India providing classroom coaching with the same quality and affordability. However, our online courses are available everywhere and give you flexibility to study from home.

faq.question: Is doubt solving available?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We have dedicated doubt solving sessions after classes. You can ask questions during live classes, post doubts in the app, or attend special doubt clearing sessions. Our teachers are always available to help you.

faq.question: Do you provide test series?
faq.answer: Yes, comprehensive test series is included in all courses. You get chapter-wise tests, part tests, and full syllabus mock tests that simulate actual JEE and NEET exams. Detailed performance analysis and All India Rank helps you track your progress.

faq.question: Who are the teachers?
faq.answer: Our faculty includes Alakh Pandey Sir for Physics and other experienced teachers who are IIT and AIIMS alumni. All teachers have extensive coaching experience and have helped thousands of students crack JEE and NEET with top ranks.

faq.question: Can I get a refund?
faq.answer: Yes, we have a student-friendly refund policy. If you're not satisfied within the initial period, you can request a refund. We want you to be completely confident in your decision to join Physics Wallah.
